channel.title: CyberNetSec - Ransomware
channel.description: Latest ransomware threat intelligence - the last 10 articles

item.title: Ingram Micro Breach Exposes Data of 42,000 After Safepay Ransomware Attack
item.description:
Global IT distributor Ingram Micro has officially notified 42,521 individuals that their personal and sensitive information, including Social Security numbers, was stolen during a ransomware attack in July 2025. The incident, attributed to the Safepay ransomware group, compromised employment and job...

Severity: High

Categories: Data Breach, Ransomware, Supply Chain Attack

Read Full Article →

item.title: Stealthy 'PDFSIDER' Backdoor Uses DLL Side-Loading to Bypass EDR and AV
item.description:
Security researchers at Resecurity have uncovered a new stealthy backdoor, dubbed 'PDFSIDER,' that uses a DLL side-loading technique to evade EDR and antivirus solutions. The malware masquerades as a legitimate PDF application to load a malicious DLL, establishing an encrypted command-and-control ch...

Severity: High

Categories: Malware, Ransomware, Threat Actor

Read Full Article →

item.title: South Korean Giant Kyowon Group Hit by Ransomware, 9.6 Million Accounts at Risk
item.description:
The South Korean conglomerate Kyowon Group has confirmed it suffered a significant ransomware attack that disrupted operations and resulted in data exfiltration. The attack, detected on January 10, 2026, compromised approximately 600 of the company's 800 servers. South Korean authorities estimate th...

Severity: Critical

Categories: Ransomware, Data Breach, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: 'DragonForce' Emerges as New Ransomware Cartel Built on LockBit and Conti DNA
item.description:
A new Ransomware-as-a-Service (RaaS) operation named DragonForce has emerged, positioning itself as a "ransomware cartel." The group is reportedly building its operations on the leaked source code of the notorious LockBit 3.0 and Conti ransomware variants. Operating a RaaS platform called 'Ransombay...

Severity: High

Categories: Ransomware, Threat Actor, Malware

Read Full Article →

item.title: Manhunt: Black Basta Ransomware Leader Added to EU's Most Wanted List After Raids
item.description:
An international law enforcement operation has targeted the prolific Black Basta ransomware group, which is linked to over 600 attacks and millions in ransom payments. Police in Ukraine conducted raids against two suspected members of the syndicate. Concurrently, an international arrest warrant and ...

Severity: High

Categories: Ransomware, Threat Actor, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: Healthcare Data Breaches Double, Fueled by 'Shadow AI' and Vendor Risk
item.description:
The healthcare industry is facing a cybersecurity crisis, with a new report indicating that the number of data breaches doubled in the past year. The surge is being driven by two key factors: the unmanaged use of generative AI tools by staff, termed 'shadow AI,' and persistent, unmitigated risks fro...

Severity: High

Categories: Data Breach, Ransomware, Policy and Compliance

Read Full Article →

item.title: Qilin Ransomware Hits French Infra Giant Bouygues, Claims 80GB Data Theft
item.description:
The prolific Qilin ransomware group has listed French multinational infrastructure firm Bouygues Energies & Services as its latest victim on its dark web leak site. The group claims to have exfiltrated 80 GB of highly sensitive data, comprising 31,000 files. Most alarmingly, the threat actors allege...

Severity: Critical

Categories: Ransomware, Industrial Control Systems, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: Everest Ransomware Claims 900 GB Data Theft from Nissan
item.description:
The Everest ransomware group has claimed a massive data breach against Japanese automotive giant Nissan Motor Co., Ltd. In a post on its dark web leak site on January 10, 2026, the group alleged it had stolen approximately 900 GB of sensitive corporate data. To back up its claim, Everest published s...

Severity: High

Categories: Ransomware, Data Breach, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: Qilin Ransomware Gang Claims Attack on Italian Manufacturer Cressi
item.description:
The prolific Russia-linked Qilin ransomware gang has claimed responsibility for a cyberattack on Cressi, a major Italian manufacturer of diving and water sports equipment. The claim was posted on the group's darknet leak site. As of January 9, 2026, the gang has not leaked any stolen data or set a p...

Severity: High

Categories: Ransomware, Threat Actor, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: NZ Patient Portal Breach Exposes Health Records of 126,000
item.description:
ManageMyHealth, New Zealand's largest online patient portal, has confirmed a significant data breach discovered on December 30, 2025. The cyberattack compromised the 'My Health Documents' module, exposing the sensitive medical records of between 108,000 and 126,000 users. A threat actor using the al...

Severity: High

Categories: Data Breach, Ransomware, Threat Actor
